channel.title: Smithing
channel.description: in my source 317 is able to smith ores and get bars , but yhere is no able to make items from bars.. how to do that in my source be able smith items?

item.title: Smithing

item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

girvidas1995:

in my source 317 is able to smith ores and get bars , but yhere is no able to make items from bars… how to do that in my source be able smith items?

I don’t know the answer. but in good english:
I got a 317 source. I can smelt ores and get bars, but i can not make items from bars… How can i do that i can smith items?
